Package se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb.transport

The transport package contains classes which assist in marshalling Java object graphs into XML.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConditionalTransportTypeConverter
    Type converter condition definition to check if instances can be packaged within JAXB transport types - and vice versa.
    JaxbConverterRegistry
    Usage specification for a registry holding JAXB converters.
    TransportMetaData
    Metadata information specification for JAXB transport type pairs, indicating which TransportType corresponds to a particular OriginalType.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultJaxbConverterRegistry
    Default JaxbConverterRegistry implementation, using reflection Converter instances to convert back and forth between JAXB-annotated transport types.
    EntityTransporter<T>
    Entity holder used to convert and transport object instances over network connections.

Package se.jguru.nazgul.core.xmlbinding.spi.jaxb.transport Description

The transport package contains classes which assist in marshalling Java object graphs into XML. Specifically, the EntityTransporter class is the generic holder used to convert un-marshallable types into marshallable types as well as containing the type metadata for all classes transported. This is required in order to properly unmarshal/resurrect all objects on the receiving side.

Moreover, this package-info file also holds schema name prefix definitions for the well-known Nazgul namespaces.

See Also:
EntityTransporter
